name: @stianlarsen/react-code-preview
description: A React component that provides tabbed navigation for viewing a live component preview and its source code separately.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && shx mkdir -p dist/css/ && shx mkdir -p dist/assets  && shx cp  src/css/codePreview.css dist/css/ && shx cp src/css/copybutton.css dist/css/ && shx cp src/assets/code.png dist/assets/ && shx cp src/assets/preview.png dist/assets/

author: Stian Larsen
